title: Notice to creditors and secured creditor?
question: The initial notice stated that the Meeting of creditors was scheduled for 1/3/2020. The notice I just got - Notice of Report of No Distribution - has a date of 12/27/2019 as last date to file objection. Not quite understanding this...
answers:
This is a specialty area and you probably should hire an attorney to go after the title insurer.

The bankruptcy questions would require too much back & forth because any lawyer trying to get under the hood of this case is going to have to look at the online register of actions of each and every bankruptcy case these people filed.
This appears to be very similar to another post. See my response there regarding the possibility of a recovery from the title insurance company who missed/overlooked your recorded judgment lien.
